about_the_game:
About This Game:


  • Myriad is an Action-Adventure game with Roguelite elements. Play as a new character each run, loot tons of weapons, and fight hordes of enemies in a randomly generated world.

  • Start each run with a randomly generated character with unique stats and build a loadout of powerful weapons and abilities that best suit the character.

  • Select from over 1000+ procedurally generated weapons with unique stats and abilities to annihilate all your enemies.

  • Create your own builds at the start of each run to take advantage of your characters' strengths and cover their weaknesses. Keep on improving your build as the run progresses to keep up with the rising difficulty!

Key Features


Infinite Possibilities: Randomly generated player characters along with procedurally generated weapons and levels means no two runs will ever be the same.



30+ Different Enemies: Fight against hordes of different enemies with varying abilities and difficulty. From Goblins to Mummies and everything in between!



Unique Procedurally Generated Weapons: Loot defeated enemies to find new and powerful weapons you can use. Each weapon has its own unique stats, perks, and drawbacks.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (x64)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3- 9100f / Ryzen 3 3100
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060 / RX 580
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (x64)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5- 9400f / Ryzen 5 3600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1070 / RX 590
